sidebarInfo.description: Passionate about marketing and driven by the thrill of development, I seek and embrace new skills, cultures, and ventures. With a solid foundation in communication and marketing, and armed with a 'do it or learn it' attitude my dedication to entrepreneurship propels my journey. I strive to drive value creation combining new technologies and design thinking.

projects.title: EL PUNTAZO
projects.description: loyalty program transforming everyday snack purchases into exciting rewards and fun challenges. Engaging users with gamified experiences and fostering a vibrant community, El Puntazo turns routine shopping into an adventure of prizes and unforgettable moments.

projects.title: ADORA FOOD
projects.description: customized meals and premade plates that address common health conditions and dietary needs for seniors, ensuring they receive the necessary nutrients for cognitive health, heart health, muscle mass, and metabolism

projects.title: OLIVETI D'ITALIA
projects.description: Currently leading a three-phase corporate restructuring project. The first phase involves defining distinct business units to address key client service requests, including bulk sales, eCommerce, agricultural consulting, and tailored studies. The second phase focuses on rebranding and communication strategies to reflect this restructuring. The third phase involves enhancing digital presence by developing a new webpage and optimizing the eCommerce platform.

thoughts.text: Truly love how this portfolio project is turning out, really looking forward to make this platform available to others too
Looking for more feature/adjustments to make this portfolio makes as intuitive as possible
